channel.title: Picoctf on Alan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Picoctf on Alan's Blog

item.title: PicoCTF 2018 Writeup: Forensics
item.description: Forensics Warmup 1 Problem Can you unzip this file for me and retreive the flag? Solution Just unzip the file. flag: picoCTF{welcome_to_forensics} Forensics Warmup 2 Problem Hmm for some reason I can’t open this PNG? Any ideas? Solution Using the file command, you can see that the image is, in fact, in jpeg format not png: ‚ùØ file flag.png flag.png: JPEG image data, JFIF standard 1.01 Open the image as a jpeg file to get the file.

item.title: PicoCTF 2018 Writeup: Binary Exploitation
PicoCTF 2018 Writeup: General Skills
item.description: General Warmup 1 Problem If I told you your grade was 0x41 in hexadecimal, what would it be in ASCII? Solution This is a basic introduction to ASCII codes. If you have not memorized that 0x41 is A in ASCII (which you should), you can use python to find it: >>> chr(0x41) 'A' flag: picoCTF{A} General Warmup 2 Problem Can you convert the number 27 (base 10) to binary (base 2)?
